name: Snake Link LD35
description:
Snake Link is a abstract 2D shooter based on the idea of the original snake game.
Enemies drop money that can be used to buy limbs, with different types of limbs providing different functionality.
The goal is to clear the 3 rooms and kill the final boss.

Controls:
Left-Click: Shoot
Mouse-Look: Aim
Escape: Pause/Modify Snake
